title: The Quiet Woman
description: FOR FANS Ian Rankin, and M.C. BeatonThe Quiet Woman is the latest book by two-time Edgar nominee Terence Faherty.American romance novelist Danielle Furey dreamed of returning to Ireland but not like this. Not in the company of her ne'er-do-well brother. Certainly not with her ex-husband in tow. Not even with the charming Irish barman Danny hired as their driver, not after she learned of the vengeful bookmaker on his trail.A woman of nice resources, Danny has the situation well in hand, until her party meets an Irish tour guide who claims to know the details of a terrible crime committed during the filming of The Quiet Man in 1951. Then Danny finds herself cast in the role of investigator, an investigator with an unusual the murder victim herself.
author: Terence Faherty
